pages.title: Catching Mobs
pages.text: Some smaller mobs may be caught through a variety of methods. $(br2)Arthropods can be caught in empty bottles. $(br2)Sensibly-sized fish can be bucketed up in a Water Bucket. $(br2)Other Critters can be picked up by hand. $(br2)Use a Cage Trap for anything large.

pages.title: Cage Trap
pages.text: The Cage Trap solves most mob catching problems. Any mob touching an open Cage Trap will be captured inside. $(br2)Mobs inside a Cage Trap can be released by activating the Trap (with a right-click, or trough Redstone).
